name: Downhill Chaos - Mini Jam 100
description:
Controlls
A/D - Move
Space - Jump

This game was arranged in a chilled game jam session with my friend from Tisosoft. The goal is to finish with as much chaos created as possible. 

Everytime you hit a tree your ball splits and creates more balls rolling down the hill. Will you be the first one to reach the bottom in this overloaded race?

Feel free to leave critique and feedback! :)
For the Challengers: 
The Highscore lays at 1051!
